name: Orfeo (cachodragon, Natàlia Puig, Pol Vega)
description:
Sinopsis

After the death of his beloved, Orfeo goes to the underworld to bring her back to life. Hades proposes a game: if he can escape the hell, he will return his wife soul. One goddess, seeing such a heroic act, sings to show Orfeo the way out.

Mechanics

The player will encounter rooms with different doors. A human female voice will come from the right door while other instruments sound will be increasing in volume with every second. The player quickly has to find the right doors to get to the overworld. If he takes to long or uses one incorrect entry, he will lose, and he will be trapped on the underworld forever.
